summary: For Aries Ascendant, Saturn transiting the 6th house strengthens the capacity to handle work pressure, competition, and daily responsibilities with discipline. Challenges arise through workload, health routines, or conflicts, but steady effort brings clear victories. This phase rewards persistence, ethical conduct, and structured habits, gradually turning obstacles into areas of mastery and control.

sections.heading: Competition, Conflicts, and Resolution
points: Opposition is handled through patience and strategy.
Slow but steady wins over impulsive reactions.
Legal or formal matters favor discipline.

sections.heading: Health, Routine, and Physical Endurance
points: Focus on bones, digestion, and posture.
Neglect shows as fatigue or chronic strain.

sections.heading: Debts, Obligations, and Practical Control
points: Debts and obligations require structured repayment.

closing: Saturn in the 6th house for Aries Ascendant transforms challenges into disciplined strength. Through perseverance and order, this transit establishes lasting control over work, health, and opposition.
